name: KINGDOM HEARTS Re:coded
description:
With Organization XIII defeated and order restored to the worlds, it was
just another day in the Kingdom...until Jiminy Cricket noticed lines in
his journal that he did not write. Realizing that “bugs” are appearing
in the journal’s records, King Mickey calls upon Sora, the only person
he can count on to save the glitch-filled worlds. What Sora discovers in
the datascape is a truth that not only links him to the past, but also
opens the door to his next journey...

The future of the KINGDOM HEARTS series arrives on Nintendo DS: From
world-renowned creator and character designer Tetsuya Nomura comes the
latest installment in the beloved KINGDOM HEARTS series. Sora, Mickey,
Donald, Goofy and a host of familiar faces from KINGDOM HEARTS and
FINAL FANTASY unite once again for an exciting new adventure.

Classic KINGDOM HEARTS gameplay with innovative twists: All-new
features include a new character growth system created specifically
for the Nintendo DS release, building on the series’ immersive blend
of action and role-playing elements.

An assortment of diverse and entertaining boss battles: Guide Sora
like never before through boss battles inspired by side-scrolling,
shooting and classic FINAL FANTASY games.

Endless possibilities in the Avatar Menu: Players can design their own
avatar using over 800 unlockable parts and trade playable maps with
friends.
